texts.definition: Actions that allow tokens to be removed or replaced from bags without playing them.
markups: <style="Definition">Actions that allow tokens to be removed or replaced from bags without playing them.</style>

Some games make use of bags with various tokens in them to create randomness, this by letting players draw tokens blindly. However, some of these use <style="CurrentLink">Bag Management</style> to let players manipulate these bags through removing or replacing tokens to get better distributions.

<style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Yggdrasil">Yggdrasil</link></style> provides actions to improve the distribution of tokens in a bag by randomly drawing tokens and only replacing the wanted ones.

While <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Hyperborea">Hyperborea</link></style> has bag building as a core mechanic, it does not provide actions to view the contents of bags and replace or remove tokens in it. Therefore, it doesn't support <style="CurrentLink">Bag Management</style>.

<style="CurrentLink">Bag Management</style> is a way to modify how <style="Link"><link="bag-building">Bag Building</link></style> works. Designing it consists of which actions to manipulate the bag besides the basic ones of putting <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Tokens">Tokens</link></style> into bags and removing them later. The basic move to support <style="CurrentLink">Bag Management</style> is removing <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Tokens">Tokens</link></style> without "playing" them. Options include replacing <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Tokens">Tokens</link></style> with other ones instead of removing, removing (or replacing) several, and blindly taking several but only removing (or replacing) certain (<style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Yggdrasil">Yggdrasil</link></style> makes use of the last of these).

<style="CurrentLink">Bag Management</style> adds <style="Link"><link="freedom-choice">Freedom of Choice</link></style> to <style="Link"><link="bag-building">Bag Building</link></style> and can let players create <style="Link"><link="http://virt10.itu.chalmers.se/index.php/Player-Decided%20Distributions">Player-Decided Distributions</link></style>. This can provide a time-limited form of <style="Link"><link="abstract-player-construct-development">Abstract Player Construct Development</link></style> for games with <style="Link"><link="abstract-player-constructs">Abstract Player Constructs</link></style>.
